As far as I am able to recall, I got ~850 ore from a class A asteroid.

As far as I know the full mass of the asteroid can mined for Ore, so a 50t asteroid should yield 50t (or about 5000 units) of ore.

But I have not tried it out, so I'm not entirely sure.

If that's the case,what happens to the mass of the asteroid? if I transfer the ore from the asteroid does the asteroid become lighter? Or does the mass essentially double?

I'll try all of this out tomorrow, I'm playing normal mode and just unlocked the tech.
